p: The liver tissues stored at -80°C were homogenized in PBS (pH = 7.4). Homogenates were centrifuged at 3000 × g for 10 min at 4°C [ 41]. Then the suspensions were used for antioxidant indexes analysis. The protein concentration in livers was estimated with BCA protein assay kit (Beijing Solarbio Science & Technology Co., Ltd., China)
